A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you keep everything the same thematically as they did with The Force Awakens\, people get bent out of shape.  If you take a new path\, as they did with The Last Jedi\, people get bent out of shape\,  Just go see the movie.  Let logic slide away because if you're complaining about TLJ not having a clear path\, or that there are plot holes\, keep in mind George did that with ALL SIX movies he oversaw.  This movie is entertaining.  It's a 2 1/2 hour movie that feels like a 1 1/2 hour movie.  Overthink it at your own peril.
